analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0xd67cb3d1a748e25b8768ebf4218c7903f4c84823.sol:
	Contract Taboo has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0xd67cb3d1a748e25b8768ebf4218c7903f4c84823.sol#256-257)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xd67cb3d1a748e25b8768ebf4218c7903f4c84823.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/24/0xd67cb3d1a748e25b8768ebf4218c7903f4c84823.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/24/0xd67cb3d1a748e25b8768ebf4218c7903f4c84823.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
